component.notes:
There is no discrete input command for USB. Use "InputNext" command to toggle to it.
TELNET RAW EMITTER SETUP (IR_Server): -This profile uses state variable "RawEmitterIndex" (0-7) for raw command routing. -Set emitter per device instance in Blueprint: 1)Inspect the TV component. 2)Open State Variables. 3)Set RawEmitterIndex to desired output (0-7). -Optional runtime setup: 1)Use custom action "SetRawEmitter". 2)Pass action argument EmitterIndex (0-7). -Use different RawEmitterIndex values for multiple TVs on the same Telnet server.
Version: Telnet 1.0 Change: Converted IR transport to Telnet raw Racepoint JSON via IR_Server board.
====================== Change Log ================== Version: 1.2 Change: Added stereo and amplifier resources to the internal media server connection. Risk: Low Importance: Critical
Version: 2.2, Change: Adicionado hdmi smart e retira funcao smart interna
Version: 3.2, Change: Adicionado funcoes hdmi smart e troca do nome
Version: 4.2, Change: HDMI audio
Version: 5.2, Change: volume
Version: 6.2, Change: Power On
Version: 6.3, Change: Power Off Repetições
Version: 6.6, Change: Adição de um novo comando de Power Off. TVs Novas.
Version: 6.7, Change: Adição de um comando de HDMI após 1 segundo
Version: 7.9, Change: ..

action_argument.name: ColorMode
action_argument.note: Enter a Color Level (00 - 64) in hex

action_argument.name: TrebleMode
action_argument.note: Enter the Treble Level (00 - 64) in hex

action_argument.name: BassMode
action_argument.note: Enter the Bass Level (00 - 64) in hex

action_argument.name: ColorTemperatureMode
action_argument.note: Select a Color Temperature (00 - Medium, 01 - Cool, 02-Warm)

action_argument.name: EnergyOption
action_argument.note: Energy Saving Opiton:00 -Low Power Off ,01-Low Power Minimum, 02-Low Power Medium, 03 - Low Power Maximum, 04 - Low Power Auto, 05 - Low Power Screen(LCD TV only), 10 - Intelligent Sensor Low(Plasme TV only), 11 - Intelligent Sensor Middle(Plasme TV only), 12 - Intelligent Sensor High(Plasme TV only)

action_argument.name: 3DTransmissionModes
action_argument.note: 00: Top and Bottom, 01: Side by Side, 02: Check Board, 03: Frame Sequential

action_argument.name: 3DLeftRightModes
action_argument.note: 00: Right to Left, 01: Left to Right
